FuncDef:
The apply entropy-label none command discards the entropy label of BGP routes.
The undo apply entropy-label none command cancels the configuration.
By default, the entropy label of BGP routes is not discarded.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On a device enabled to add the entropy label to advertised routes using the peer advertise-entropy-label command, if you want to discard the entropy label in received or advertised BGP routes, run the apply entropy-label none command in an import or export route-policy. Then, the entropy label in the BGP routes that match the if-match clauses will be discarded.
Prerequisites
A route-policy has been configured.
